body_html:
I have same problem as:

ERROR: No default_toolchain found for cpu 'aarch64'. Valid cpus are: [
 k8, 
 piii,
 arm,
 darwin,
 ppc,
 x64_windows,
]

I solved this by @apolotsk 's method at #21852 (comment)

add


default_toolchain {
  cpu: "aarch64"
  toolchain_identifier: "local_linux"
}

to ./third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.tpl.

body:
I have same problem as: 

```
ERROR: No default_toolchain found for cpu 'aarch64'. Valid cpus are: [
 k8, 
 piii,
 arm,
 darwin,
 ppc,
 x64_windows,
]
```


I solved this by  @apolotsk 's method at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/21852#issuecomment-424718576  

```
add


default_toolchain {
  cpu: "aarch64"
  toolchain_identifier: "local_linux"
}

to ./third_party/gpus/crosstool/CROSSTOOL.tpl.
```
